remarks: The image structure's ring multiplication is a function.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Feb-2015.)
statement:
imasaddf.f $e |- ( ph -> F : V -onto-> B ) $.
imasaddf.e $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( a e. V /\ b e. V ) /\ ( p e. V /\ q e. V ) ) -> ( ( ( F ` a ) = ( F ` p ) /\ ( F ` b ) = ( F ` q ) ) -> ( F ` ( a .x. b ) ) = ( F ` ( p .x. q ) ) ) ) $.
imasaddf.u $e |- ( ph -> U = ( F "s R ) ) $.
imasaddf.v $e |- ( ph -> V = ( Base ` R ) ) $.
imasaddf.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. Z ) $.
imasmulf.p $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
imasmulf.a $e |- .xb = ( .r ` U ) $.
imasmulfn $p |- ( ph -> .xb Fn ( B X. B ) ) $.
$d .x. p q $.
$d .xb a b p q $.
$d B p q $.
$d F a b p q $.
$d R p q $.
$d V a b p q $.
$d a b p ph q $.
